NodeCommTimes
NodeCommTimes

Contains a global map of Wireless Node addresses to last communication times.

Variables
m_nodesLastCommTime
static std::map<NodeAddress, Timestamp> m_nodesLastCommTime

A map of node address to Timestamp objects, holding the last communication time for nodes.

m_nodesLastState
static std::map<NodeAddress, DeviceState> m_nodesLastState

A mpa of node address to DeviceState objects, holding the last known state for nodes.

Functions
updateCommTime
static void updateCommTime(
NodeAddress 
nodeAddress
)

Sets the communication time for the given node address to the current system time.

Parameters
nodeAddress
NodeAddress

The node address to update the last communication time for.

updateDeviceState
static void updateDeviceState(
NodeAddress 
nodeAddress,
DeviceState 
state
)

Sets the DeviceState for the given node address.

Parameters
nodeAddress
NodeAddress

The node address to update

state
DeviceState

The DeviceState to set.

getLastCommTime
static const Timestamp& getLastCommTime(
NodeAddress 
nodeAddress
)

Gets the last communication time for the given node address.

Parameters
nodeAddress
NodeAddress

The node address to get the last communication time for.

Exceptions

  • Error_NoData: There is no communication time logged for the given node address.

getLastDeviceState
static DeviceState getLastDeviceState(
NodeAddress 
nodeAddress
)

Gets the last device state for the given node address.

Parameters
nodeAddress
NodeAddress

The node address to get the last device state for.

Returns

The DeviceState of the node address.
